description: woman wearing a large hat with black feathers, holding a slotted spoon, seated behind a cauldron filled with books; other figures beneath trees in middle ground at left; trees on top half of image; \"1908\" on cauldron; \"Les Cent Bibliophiles\" in smoke coming from fire beneath cauldron
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on back, in pen LLC, in the print: [A. LEPERE]; on cauldron, LRQ,
title: Menu for the Cent Bibliophiles
